Spoken Word
Song Exploder – Episode 102: Gorillaz – Andromeda (feat. D.R.A.M.)

Release date: 11th April 2017

This episode of the podcast, Song Exploder features Damon Albarn & DRAM explaining the making of Andromeda.

Things I Like by Russel

Release dates:

Trailer: 1st May 2018
Episodes 1-2: 2nd May 2018
Episode 3: 9th May 2018
Episode 4: 16th May 2018
Episode 5: 23rd May 2018
Episodes 6-7: 30th May 2018

Where to listen: https://www.deezer.com/en/show/56535

This podcast was released through Deezer and features Russel interviewing various collaborators from Humanz.

Episodes:

0. Introducing Things I Like by Russel from Gorillaz
1. Posdnuos: advice to my younger self
2. Jehnny Beth’s afterlife dinner party
3. Peven Everett: are aliens amongst us?
4. Little Simz: stillness in wonderland
5. Pauline Black on the power of Ska
6. Cheick Tidiane Seck: Africa is the future
7. Gabriel Wallace and Russel’s drumming masterclass
